metadata.title: CVE-2013-7489 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Beaker library through 1.11.0 for Python is affected by deserializationof untrusted data, which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: beaker: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
